import java.util.Random;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Task1Intern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		Random r=new Random();
		String playAgain=" ";
		int totalScore=0;
		
		do { 
			int num=r.nextInt(100)+1;
			int countAttempt=0;
			int guess=0;
			int maxAttempt=5;
			 System.out.println("Guess the number between 1 to 100");
			 System.out.println("You have "+maxAttempt+" attempts");
		    while(guess!=num&&countAttempt<maxAttempt) {
			 System.out.println("Enter the guess");
			 guess=sc.nextInt();
			 countAttempt++;
		    if(guess<num)
				System.out.println("Too Low!");
			else if(guess>num)
				System.out.println("Too High!");
			else {
			    System.out.println("Correct! You guessed it in "+countAttempt+" attempts");
		        totalScore=(maxAttempt- countAttempt+1);}
		}if(guess!=num) {
			System.out.println("Ooh!You Are Out of attempts!The number was "+num);
		}
			System.out.println("\nDo you want to play again? (yes/no):");
			playAgain=sc.next();
		}
		while(playAgain.equalsIgnoreCase("yes"));
		System.out.println("Your Final Score is "+totalScore);
		System.out.println("Thanks for playing");
	
	}
}
